pkgmetadata.longdescription: Azoth, the modular IM client for LeechCraft

use.flag: Build Acetamide, the IRC protocol support
Build ChatHistory which stories chat history
Build support for native Azoth's emoticons packs
Build p100q, plugin for psto.net microblogging service
Build support for standard Azoth styles engine
Build Xoox, gloox-based plugin for XMPP support
